entry.title: This is Me Trying
entry.summary:
Author: lushescape

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,840Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 104

Summary: "Jay's here tonight. I could introduce them.” Dick mumbles with a smile and you notice him burying his face into the side of your friend's hair. Ugh.“Jason?” A younger voice pipes up, you turn your head to take in the newcomers. “If you hate your friend you could just say that, there is no need for torture.” Dick laughs before introducing his younger brother, Damian.OrThe time your friend drags you to a street race and you meet her ridiculously good looking boyfriend and his intimidating brothers.

entry.title: The Way You See Me
entry.summary:
Author: Xivkyn

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,366Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 35

Summary: After being an experiment to Hugo Strange for the majority of your life you finally escape. The trauma of your time there follows you as you remember the screams and death all around you. You don't even know your own name as the number 'Seven' was the only semblance of a name you were given. You have no one to go home to and nothing you look forward to except for revenge. It consumes your every thought ever since you escaped. You want him to feel the pain he caused you and your friends.Limited y/n usage

entry.title: The Haunting
entry.summary:
Author: narnian_neverlander

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,961Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 23

Summary: “You really never stopped searching… Never gave up…”It’s quiet, almost reverent - like he still can’t believe it, even though the proof is right there in front of him. And you can feel the sting of tears behind your eyes before you know it; no modulator to make him sound like a different man, a monster. No sobs racking his entire body, turning his voice hoarse and frantic. Just Jason. Exhausted and broken, but still Jason. Your Jason. Who sounds like he can’t fathom the idea of you caring enough, loving him enough, to dedicate your life to bringing him home.

entry.summary:
Author: ToTheStars8

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,309Chapters: 20/?Kudos: 527

Summary: Secure in your position in the Kent household you are more than happy in your station in life. Yet, when the Wayne family enters the town, you are entranced by the second eldest son, Mr. Jason Todd. entry.title: Under Pressure
entry.summary:
Author: bloodbythemiddleeast (laptopsocks)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,550Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 63

Summary: There’s almost something unsettling about how that moves you—how Jason’s character could be cracked open by a single Jane Austen line, buried in the pages of a book he keeps within reach. It softens him, grinds the edges of his form in your memory, sands the grit from his words in your hand, and you think this living arrangement might not be too bad after all.What’s so bad about a big man reading a little bit of Jane Austen, anyway?In which your roommate keeps arriving home bloodied and bruised, stubborn and a little cruel. Good thing he knows how to fuck.

entry.summary:

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,480Chapters: 2/40Kudos: 10

Summary: Jason was your everything. No matter how many years pass, you'll never recover from how he was taken from you. You still saw him, anywhere and everywhere.
